casebody.data:
Larry JONES
v.
STATE of NC. No. 507P04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 2, 2004. William P. Hart, Special Deputy Attorney General, C. Branson Vickory, III, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 1st day of October 2004 by Plaintiff for Relief:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 2nd day of December 2004."
